desc: Danalyser provides ready-made and custom templates solution, specialises in Google Sheets templates, Google Data Studio templates, and Canva Report templates. Danalyser is founded by SL, a data analyst turned solopreneur who are inspired to help small businesses achieve success with the power of data analytics.

layout.text: We helped small businesses, social media experts and consultants in data reporting and visualisation. Specialisation: Google Sheets and Google Data Studio.
